pr_title: GG-30518 Add support for IN and EXISTS statement to SQL Regression framework

timeline.message: GG-30518 Add support for IN and EXISTS statement to SQL Regression framework

timeline.bodyText:
I know that it isn't scope of this task, but can we replace
scopeTbls.get(rnd.nextInt(scopeTbls.size())))
with
pickRndItem(scopeTbls)
here to improve code readability?
timeline.author: Berkof

timeline.bodyText: Should we have some documentation about what filters can be generated with this tools? Because now it's become not obvious what conditions can be generated by this tool.
timeline.author: Berkof

replies.bodyText: What kind of documentation do you mean?
replies.author: korlov42

replies.bodyText: Maybe just javadoc with all types of queries or some other logic description. For example - why we must generate some special conditions for subquery?
replies.author: Berkof

timeline.message: new condition for OR to IN optimization
new condition for OR to IN optimization
